caption.title: Phytophthora ramorum positive streams and models of potential range of the pathogen in the USA.
caption.p: Stream positive detections in the eastern USA and Washington state are those known at July 2010 [60]. As modelled using CLIMEX and the composite model parameters of our model under 1961â€“1990 climate normals (a); and as generated using a Genetic Algorithm for Rule-set Production (GARP) based on known Californian occurrences and three ecological datasets by Kluza et al. [24] (b).
